Text: Underfist: Halloween Bash:  The special was going to be the setup for a new series spin-off of "Grim & Evil", but the contract of Maxwell Atoms with Cartoon Network expired before moving to Disney Channel for the TV series "Fish Hooks" and the special was ultimately the finale of the "Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy" franchise.
